channel.title: Tables :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description:
Tables were amongst the first addition to HTML (along with images), as they were necessary for the primary role of early HTML, disseminating research. A table requires a lot of elements to be nested in a specific manner. It is best expressed through an example:
Name Role
Darth Vader Antagonist
Luke Skywalker Coming-of-age protagonist
Princess Lea Heroic resistance fighter
Obi-Wan Kenobi Wise old man
Han Solo Likeable scoundrel
Chewbacca The muscle
Threepio Comedic foil
Artoo Deetoo Plot driver
It renders as:
